## withTimeout() function

Wrap a cancellable task with a timeout.

```js
async function fetchWithTimeout(url, timeoutMs, raceCancel) {
  return await withTimeout((raceTimeout) => cancellableFetch(url, raceTimeout), timeoutMs, raceCancel);
}

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function withTimeout<TResult>(task: CancellableTask<TResult>, milliseconds: number, raceCancel?: RaceCancel): Promise<TResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  task | [CancellableTask](./race-cancellation.cancellabletask.md)<!-- -->&lt;TResult&gt; | a cancellable task |
|  milliseconds | number | a timeout in miliseconds |
|  raceCancel | [RaceCancel](./race-cancellation.racecancel.md) | an optional outer [RaceCancel](./race-cancellation.racecancel.md) function |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TResult&gt;
